tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeInformation (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    performance_review TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE employees (employee_id INT, first_name VARCHAR(50), last_name VARCHAR(50), salary DECIMAL, hire_date DATE, performance_review TEXT )
CREATE TABLE salaries (employee_id INT, salary DECIMAL, salary_date DATE, salary_type VARCHAR(10) )
CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (review_id INT, employee_id INT, review_date DATE, review_text TEXT )

CREATE TABLE employee_personal_info (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    reviewer_name TEXT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    review_date DATE NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    comments TEXT
);
